message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you to acquire a product that I believe will be invaluable to your business. I understand its worth to you is $1,000,000, and I'm confident it can generate significant returns. I'm offering it to you for $1,050,000. This price reflects the value I place on it and allows for a mutually beneficial arrangement. Please consider this offer carefully, as I have another interested party who is willing to pay $1,000,000.
